title: Pwned Passwords Version 4
description_short: Pwned Passwords is a dataset of 551 million real world passwords previously exposed in data breaches. Released by Have I Been Pwned? in January 2019.
description_long:
This is an old version of the Pwned Passwords dataset. View the current version.

Pwned Passwords is a dataset of 551,509,767 real world passwords previously exposed in data breaches. Released by Have I Been Pwned? in January 2019.

More info at haveibeenpwned.com (archived)
View dataset on archive.org
